title: Romances (roughly equivalent to ballads) are poems defined by their metric form, with a narrative, epic, or lyric nature. The Romancero is all the romances known. The romances written in the Middle Ages go under the name of Romancero viejo. Because of their subject matter, most of them are related to the epic cycles or chronicles and medieval novels. They are anonymous and are supposedly traditional and popular in origin
